name: Squeen's Adventure 2: Crash On Mars
description:
Now that Squeen has built his space ship, he can get back to his home planet! However, Squeen forgot that spaceships still run on engines. As such when leaving earth, he crashes into the surface of Mars. Help our alien pal, Squeen scrounge up some parts of an engine so he can charge his phone and get back to his home planet!

Credits:

Game Design - NotTGP

Music Production - NotTGP, ArcadeGamer

Playtesters - TSG_x0, NotTGP, ArcadeGamer
